name: Trou or False
description:
A game made in 4 hours by Ajreckof, Caval, Ozÿwart and Wazabi for the Trijam #142.
We did our best. It is pretty unpolished and only have a couple of levels.
To play, simply drag and drop anywhere on the screen with your mouse.

We made it in Godot, which was a bad idea since half our team had no experience with game development or with Godot. We are proud nonetheless and we hope you can enjoy this really small prototype. We hope to make it into a small game at some point.

If you're wondering about the title "Trou or False", "trou" is French for "hole" and is pronounced like "true" (but with a French accent, obviously).
